j4careRESTCoercionProcessorWebApplicatio.title: Web Application Name
j4careRESTCoercionProcessorWebApplicatio.description: Web Application Name of the Workflow Manager Web Application to get the URL and Keycloak Configuration

j4careRESTCoercionProcessorQueryParamete.title: Query Parameters
j4careRESTCoercionProcessorQueryParamete.description: List of DICOM Tags to pass to Workflow Manager to find the Workflow entry in the respective Workflow

j4careRESTCoercionProcessorCacheMaxSize.title: Cache Max Size
j4careRESTCoercionProcessorCacheMaxSize.description: Maximum Number of REST Responses to cache

j4careRESTCoercionProcessorCacheStaleTim.title: Cache Stale Timeout
j4careRESTCoercionProcessorCacheStaleTim.description: Timeout in seconds before a Cache Entry is invalid and a new response will be requested from the Workflow Manager
